actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide price support for milk at not less than 90 percent of the parity price therefor.

summary.text: Establishes, under the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended, the support price of milk at not less than 90 percent of parity for the period beginning with the date of enactment of this Act and ending on March 31, 1976. Declares that it is the sense of the Congress that the President: (1) limit the quantity of meat imports to a specified amount; and (2) issue a proclamation stating that import quotas on butter, butter oil, cheddar cheese, and nonfat dry milk not be increased above the levels prevailing as of June 1, 1971.

titles.title: A bill to provide price support for milk at not less than 90 percent of the parity price therefor.
